page.description: Insert word(s) into text at word position.
page.syntax: New_String as C = *WORD_INSERT(text as c,insert as c,word as n,separator as c)

argument.name: New_String
argument.description: The modified text with word(s) inserted.

argument.name: word
argument.description: The position of inserted word in the list. Numeric

argument.name: separator
argument.description: Default The word separator character(s). Character

page.discussion: The *WORD_INSERT() function adds one or more words to a string.
